Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 8
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.Hu Feng is pictured as a torturer in caricature number eight, scheming the subversion of people who have been hoodwinked by his henchmen. Assorted torture devices are visible, as well as hand grenades. A picture of Jiang Jieshi (Chiang Kai-shek) hangs on the wall, and Chiang's blueprint for the liberation of the mainland within five years is the focus.
